April 16, 1957
Mrs. J. Marriott
European Broadcasting Union
Geneva 20 Montbrillant
Geneva, SWITZERLAND
Dear Mrs. Marriott;
Thank you very much for your letter of April 13 regarding our NAEB - TV
Research Fact Sheets.
The free exchange arrangraent you mention in your letter dated from when
we were not paying members of the B.B.U. We now are paying members. We must charge
all organizations to whom we, on our part, pay annual dues or fee. We are sorry
but if you wish to continue receiving our R*ct Sheets, you will have to pay the #2.50
fee. You will be billed by the University. As I mentioned earlier, if you do not
wish to pay this nominal charge, then please return the postcard or drop me a note.
I hope this has not been too much of an inconvenience. We hope that we
may continue to have the privilege of serving you.
Sincerely,
blcc: H. U. Skomia
(Mrs.) Jhdith B. Gans
Secretary
